author: Anne VanderMey
title: Etsy Rallies Its Artisanal Troops: 'Start Making Face Masks'
description: Some crafters are working 12-hour days to meet surging demand.
content:
A woman makes fabric masks with a sewing machine in her home in Bologna, Italy on April 3.
Bloomberg’s daily technology newsletter is chronicling the impact of Covid-19 on the global tech industry. Sign up 
here.
Etsy crafts never seemed like essential goo… [+3065 chars]
